secoundPage.title: Yoga Classes
secoundPage.description: Our Yoga Centre is located at Selvapuram Coimbatore. We offer regular yoga classes from Monday to Saturday and the timings of the class schedules are given below. All the classes are taught under the watchful guidance of Chandrasekar and Thenmozhi Chandrasekar of well experienced and qualified yoga masters. Before joining our regular yoga classes all students are recommended to undergo a general health assessment conducted by our yoga therapist. Because we customized yoga as per your need and health issues.To book a private consultation or private yoga session with Master Chandrasekar and Thenmozhi please email us at Pranavayogacbe@gmail.com Regular Yoga classes are conducted daily, in the morning and at evening.
secoundPage.secoundTitle: Personal care yoga at your Place/Doorstep
secoundPage.highLightWords: We offer doorstep yoga.One on one session,Customized yoga with personal care,Flexible timing.
secoundPage.secoundDescription: In this busy schedule we rush to work and don't have time to care for our mental and physical health. So our experienced PRANAVA YOGA teachers come at your place( Home or Office ) at your flexible convenient time to take care of yourself and also we provide one to one session for better results.They customized yoga as per your need and body type,it will help you to reach your specific goal.

ThirdPage.title: Online Yoga Class
ThirdPage.description1: We offer Online Yoga classes, Online Yoga Therapy Consultation, Online Accredited Yoga Teacher Training Courses.
ThirdPage.description2: As technology continues to evolve daily, online learning has emerged as one of the tools professionals choose to utilise in order to simplify the learning process in various fields. We take online yoga classes in and around the world.
ThirdPage.description3: Our Pranava Yoga teachers are very experienced in the field of yoga and have been involved in this art for well over 20 years. Our highly qualified and experienced teachers will tailor the practice to meet your specific goals and needs. We put a lot of conscious effort in making sure that you experience yoga learning in the best way possible. To avail a class online please email Pranavayogacbe@gmail.com or send a whatsapp message to +91 8667420207 ( calls, WhatsApp message)

part1.title: Group Yoga Classes
part1.description: Our online classes are conducted in a live set up via ZOOM or by Google meet by an experienced teacher and are not pre-recorded. Once you have purchased the online group class package please send a WhatsApp to +91 8667420207 ( calls, WhatsApp message) and our staff will set up the online class booking system and assist you with the process of booking the classes.

part2.title: One on One Hatha Yoga Private Classes
part2.description: This private class is suitable for both beginners and advanced practitioners. This is a class where you can interact with our highly qualified and experienced teacher who can teach you basic to intermediate level yoga practices that can improve your strength, flexibility and vigour. The class timings can be booked according to your’s and instructor’s availability and can be done via ZOOM, Skype or Google Meet. Once you have purchased the package below please send a WhatsApp to +91 8667420207 ( calls, WhatsApp message)and our staff will assist you with the process of booking the classes.

part3.title: Yoga Therapy Consultation
part3.description: We offer one on one online yoga therapy sessions which are conducted by our highly qualified and experienced yoga therapists. This online yoga therapy consultation is suitable for people with certain ailments or conditions. The yoga therapist and the student will get to have an extensive consultation session. Through this consultation session, our therapists would get to know and understand the past and current state of the condition, thereby enabling him to be able to suggest certain yogic diet recommendation and various yoga practices. He would also be able to recommend some gentle therapeutic sequence of yoga unique to just that individual according to the condition. This online yoga therapy consultation will aid in addressing different conditions and ailments of the body and mind.

part4.title: Corporate Yoga Classes
part4.description: We offer online corporate yoga classes that are tailor-made for a group of office workers and executives who tend to work for very long hours and need a little time to relax and reboot their mind and body. Our experienced teachers will conduct simple but yet very effective yoga poses, breathing, and simple meditation techniques. These online classes could either be done at their office desk, a quiet meeting room or anywhere else designated for such activities by the corporate body to enjoy the benefits of yoga. Regular lunchtime classes or after-work classes can be arranged by the corporate office whenever they need a good break from work and all the stress it entails. For more details about Online Corporate Yoga Classes please email Pranavayogacbe@gmail.com or send a WhatsApp message to +91 8667420207 ( calls, WhatsApp message)

TimeTable.title: Classes Timetable
TimeTable.description: This class is suitable for all levels of yoga practitioners, Asanas, Pranayamas Mudras, Bandhas, Kriyas and relaxation techniques are taught in this class. Separate classes are held for ladies and gentlemen.
